name: Paws & Claws: Regal Resort
overview: Care for royal pets as you build your business into a five-star resort. From grooming and feeding to teaching tricks and tailored treats-it's up to you to spoil every guest. Features • Pamper 6 posh pets including dogs, cats, horses, and rabbits-indulge them until their heart's content. • Look after the needs of each pet and return them to their owner in tip-top shape. • Stop by the local pet supply sotre for all your pets' needs.
